problem.markdown:
1. Aluminium is ______________ in weight as compared to copper, but has _________ conductivity and tensile strength.
() Heavier, Smaller (x) Lighter, Smaller () Lighter, Greater () Heavier, Greater
2. Copper conductor is
() Highly durable and has high scrap value () Homogenous material () It has high current density, so lesser X-sectional area of conductor is required (x) All
3. Lighting arrestor are also called as __________
(x) Surge arrestor () Capacitive detector () All () Charge inhibitor
4. _________ is a device which is used to switch from one bus to the other without any interruption in power supply and without creating hazardous arcs.
() Any of the them () Circuit breaker () Bus coupler () Isolator 5. The sag in aluminium conductors is __________ the copper conductors.
(x) Greater than () Equal to () Lesser than () 2 times lesser than
problem.p: 1. Aluminium is ______________ in weight as compared to copper, but has _________ conductivity and tensile strength.

choicegroup.choice: Highly durable and has high scrap value
It has high current density, so lesser X-sectional area of conductor is required

problem.p: 3. Lighting arrestor are also called as __________
4. _________ is a device which is used to switch from one bus to the other without any interruption in power supply and without creating hazardous arcs.
5. The sag in aluminium conductors is __________ the copper conductors.
